item.title: Yay ! This's my 101st blog post
item.description: Hi there, I start this blog from Nov 30, 2015. It means I have taken a 777-day journey through every line, every single word of this blog. (Oh man ! It’s a lucky number !!!) 777 / 101 = 7.(6930)(6930)(6930)(6930)… days per post ğŸ˜± You know, sometimes we can’t achieve anything without help from the others. And yes, it’s from you - who reading this line. You are the purpose, the (why) I wrote this thing.
